title: How To: Put On Zagg InvisibleShield iPad Air Glass Screen Protector ID5GLSF00
description:
How To Put On Zagg InvisibleShield iPad Air Glass Screen Protector - ID5GLS-F00 

What you will need:
-painters tape
-microfiber cleaning cloth
-clean surface
-screen cleaning wipe provided by Zagg
-Glass Protector provided by Zagg


In just a few simple steps you can put on the Zagg Screen Protector on your iPad Air. 
You will want to make sure that the iPad screen has no smudges. 
Use the microfiber cleaning cloth to get rid of any stains/smudges. 
Using the painters tape take a large piece and remove all excess lint and dirt off the screen. (The painters tape had low adhesive and will not damage the iPad screen)
Use the wipe to help remove debris
Next you will want to place the protector so it lines up with the home button
After laying it down and taking the air out remove the adhesive. 
Wipe down with the microfiber cloth




Zagg InvisibleShield iPad Air Glass Screen Protector - ID5GLS-F00 http://abt.com/product/88369/Zagg-ID5GLSF00.html

Features:
• Protective: Made of fortified tempered glass it delivers unprecedented scratch protection.
• Crystal Clear: High-grade tempered glass provides ultimate clarity.
• Guaranteed: InvisibleShield Glass is so good it comes with a lifetime guarantee.
• Sensitive: At only 0.4mm thin Glass offers ultimate touchscreen sensitivity.
